name: BG Group
overview:
Commercially savvy, environmentally and socially responsible, we’re active in 20 countries over five continents. While our headquarters are in the UK, more than 60% of our talented professionals who make up the BG Group team are located outside the UK.

Our team is made up of over 6,000 talented people drawn from 65 nationalities. And with skills ranging from project management and shipping to procurement and reservoir engineering, our expertise covers every area of the oil and natural gas business.

Together, we’re tackling some of the most complex, ambitious projects in the energy industry. We’re driving industry-leading growth. And we’re building a truly great and global energy busines
